content: A company has implemented a new software that automatically generates invoices and sends them to customers. The software can process 100 invoices in 1 hour. If the company has 2000 invoices to process, how many hours will it take for the software to complete the task? Round your answer to the nearest whole number.

To determine how many hours it will take for the software to process 2000 invoices, you can use the following calculation:

1. The software processes 100 invoices in 1 hour.
2. Therefore, to process 2000 invoices, you would divide the total number of invoices by the number processed per hour:

   \[
   \frac{2000 \text{ invoices}}{100 \text{ invoices/hour}} = 20 \text{ hours}
   \]

So, it will take the software approximately 20 hours to complete the task. Since this is already a whole number, there's no need to round.
